intro: Eriostomum alpinum, commonly known as the alpine eriostomum, is a flowering plant native to the mountainous regions of Europe. It belongs to the family Ericaceae, which includes heathers and related plants. The plant is characterized by its small, bell-shaped flowers that range in color from white to pink. It typically grows in rocky or acidic soils at high altitudes. Eriostomum alpinum is adapted to cold climates and is often found in alpine meadows and tundra environments.
